TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CodeDomLocalizationProvider extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationProvider, class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class CodeDomLocalizationProvider Implements IDesignerSerializationProvider, IDisposable
public ref class CodeDomLocalizationProvider sealed : IDisposable, System::ComponentModel::Design::Serialization::IDesignerSerializationProvider

summary.span: 提供 CodeDOM 资源序列化服务。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是序列化提供程序提供了一个本地化功能。The class is a serialization provider that provides a localization feature. 它支持序列化为资源通过，然后它将两个属性添加到的根组件：`Language`和`Localizable`。It supports serializing to resources through , and it adds two properties to the root component: `Language` and `Localizable`. 如果`Localizable`设置为`true`，此提供程序用于更改组件属性生成，并将其值路由到的资源文件的方式。If `Localizable` is set to `true`, this provider changes the way that component properties are generated and routes their values to a resource file. 两个本地化模型提供支持。Two localization models are supported. 你可以控制提供的区域性和样式的本地化构造函数参数。You can control the cultures that are offered and the style of localization with constructor parameters.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

Public Sub New (provider As IServiceProvider, model As CodeDomLocalizationModel)

param.name: provider
param.span: ，本地化提供程序使用它添加其扩展程序属性。

span.span: An used by the localization provider to add its extender properties.

param.name: model
param.span: 值，指示 CodeDOM 资源适配器要使用的本地化模型

span.span: A value indicating the localization model to be used by the CodeDOM resource adapter

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数创建一个新的适配器，并将其附加到序列化管理器。The constructor creates a new adapter and attaches it to the serialization manager. 这将自身作为资源的序列化程序添加到序列化管理器，并，如果尚未添加，将添加本身为扩展程序提供程序到的根组件。This adds itself as a serializer for resources into the serialization manager, and, if not already added, adds itself as an extender provider to the root component. 如果`model`参数不是、提供`Language`和`Localizable`属性。If the `model` parameter is not , the provides the `Language` and `Localizable` properties.

MemberSignature.Value: public CodeDomLocalizationProvider (IServiceProvider provider, System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomLocalizationModel model, System.Globalization.CultureInfo[] supportedCultures);

span.span: An used by the localization provider to add its extender properties.

span.span: A value indicating the localization model to be used by the CodeDOM resource adapter

span.span: An array of cultures that this resource adapter should support.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数创建一个新的适配器，并将其附加到序列化管理器。The constructor creates a new adapter and attaches it to the serialization manager. 这将自身作为资源的序列化程序添加到序列化管理器，并，如果尚未添加，将添加本身为扩展程序提供程序到的根组件。This adds itself as a serializer for resources into the serialization manager, and, if not already added, adds itself as an extender provider to the root component. 如果`model`参数不是、提供`Language`和`Localizable`属性。If the `model` parameter is not , the provides the `Language` and `Localizable` properties. 如果`supportedCultures`未提供默认值是当前安装在计算机的所有区域性。If `supportedCultures` is not provided, the default is all cultures that are currently installed on the computer. 如果提供了数组的区域性，并且它包括计算机未安装的区域性，则这些区域性不可用。If an array of cultures is provided, and it includes cultures that are not installed on the computer, those cultures are not available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
